__impliedComments: In addition to the requirements of strong copyleft licenses, network copyleft licenses require you to share larger programs that you build with the licensed software not just when you give copies to others, but also when you run the software for others to use over the Internet or another network.

Strong copyleft licenses require you to share both the licensed software (like the weak copyleft licenses, and larger programs that you build with the licensed software, when you give copies to others.

Per SPDX.org, this license was released 16 May 2008 This license is OSI
certified. This license is available in the 22 official languages of the
EU. The English version is included here.
